page.title: 18Social setting
page.content: Varied newcomers have combined well with original farming families, although clustered. A microcosm of the major part of 1985 society. Whiten Hill forms a social barrier between Marsworth and Pitstone.Typical Occupations of Marsworth Inhabitants. PROFESSIONALS_ Teachers,Computing personnel,Nurses,Office/Bank executives. SELF_EMPLOYED_ Farmers, Artists, Builders, Local Traders. MANUAl WORKERS_ Cement Workers, Egg packers, Farm workers, Building workers, Mechanics, Paving stone makers. NON EMPLOYED_ Mothers at home, Retired. At a time of high National unemployment very few unemployed. HOUSING_ Average price for 4 bed detached house in S.E. under 10 years old is Â£50000. Several for sale in Marsworth now for over Â£80000. Upto double for property over 200 years.
